data.title: Dean Wilkinson Book List
data.meta_description: A complete list of all Dean Wilkinson's books in order (11 books). Browse plot descriptions, book covers, genres, pseudonyms, ratings and awards.
data.text:
The Legend of Arthur King

Nov-2005

/ General Fiction

When Arthur King decides that he is the reincarnation of King Arthur, he goes on a quest to save Albion Wood from the evil Mordred Holdings, defeat the school bully, and win the fair Gwen, aided by his new friend Lawrence....

Disturbing Bedtime Tales (For Very Bad People)

Aug-2011

/ Horror

Disturbing Bedtime Tales is an anthology that takes the medium of the fairytale and fable to new dimensions of dark and twisted, comedic surrealism. From the story of Brasnips the Pisswitch, who terrorises a village by slashing on its vegetable yield...

Dark Impressions

Jul-2012

/ Suspense

Kevin Collins is a teenage hooligan who is infatuated with the organized crime figures in his west end neighborhood of Providence, Rhode Island. He winds up on the fast track into "The Life" and evolves from petty thief to armed robber and killer as ...

Sheerluck Versus The Paranormal Volume 3

May-2019

/ General Fiction

There are dark, powerful, and terrifying, supernatural forces at work in this world. If it weren’t for the boy paranormal investigator Sheerluck, his older sister Watson, and an atomic sprite named Mycroft, you probably wouldn’t have a bum to...

The Lexitoon Mirror Times: Vol 1

Jul-2019

/ General Fiction

Ghosts, poltergeists and orbs are joining forces to put a stop to terrible ghost hunting TV shows. A spooks-person for the un-dead told us, 'We never react when they are making these awful shows. We have to just wait there, invisibly, until t...

Sheerluck Versus the Paranormal

Sep-2019

/ Fantasy

The world's only kid consulting detective is on the trail of the supernatural. Ghosts, ghouls, witches - indeed all manner of phantasmagoria - beware because Sheerluck, his sister Watson and the atomic sprite Mycroft have your details! In this volume...

Muriel's Murals Bother At Beaufort

Jan-2020

/ General Fiction

"This book is printed in a font that everyone can read, including people with dyslexia. For more info go to www.Dyslexiefont.com

Go to www.mcp-store.com to find out more about the typeface and discounts."
